title: Invitation ˝Uri Myeongjeol Hanmadang˝
content:
Dear Sir or Madame,
  We would like to cordially invite you to a party called "Uri Myeongjeol Hanmadang," meaning a holiday celebration in Korean, to celebrate one of the biggest traditional holidays, Chuseok or Korean Thanksgiving Day. This party will be held on September 27. 2006 at the Women's Center located in Doma-dong near Paichai University. The party will begin at 10:00 A.M. and end at 14:30 P.M. 
  The main purpose of this party is to offer the international community in Daejeon an opportunity to share the Korean spirit and tradition for "Chuseok." You can discover some aspects of Korean holiday tradition and deepen your understanding on Koreans.
  The program will include introduction of "Chuseok," and the municipal administration, performances, and traditional games. For lunch traditional Korean food will be served. To encourage many people to come to the party, we will offer transportation for participants.
  If you need more information, please don't hesitate contact Mr. Yang Gi-young at 600-1911.(E-mail : gy7129@ hanmail.net)
  We are looking forward to meeting you.

  Sincerely yours, Jeong Byung-son
Director of the Women's Center in Daejeon
